verses.plain: Hear, ye children, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.

tokens.t: Hear, ye children, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.

verses.plain: For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.

tokens.t: For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.

verses.plain: For I was my father’s son, tender and only beloved in the sight of my mother.

tokens.t: For I was my father’s son, tender and only
in the sight of my mother.

verses.plain: He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.

tokens.t: He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.

verses.plain: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.

tokens.t: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget
not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.

verses.plain: Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.

tokens.t: Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.

verses.plain: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.

tokens.t: Wisdom
the principal thing;
get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.

verses.plain: Exalt her, and she shall promote thee: she shall bring thee to honour, when thou dost embrace her.

tokens.t: Exalt her, and she shall promote thee: she shall bring thee to honour, when thou dost embrace her.

verses.plain: She shall give to thine head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to thee.

tokens.t: She shall give to thine head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to thee.

verses.plain: Hear, O my son, and receive my sayings; and the years of thy life shall be many.

tokens.t: Hear, O my son, and receive my sayings; and the years of thy life shall be many.

verses.plain: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.

tokens.t: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.

verses.plain: When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble.

tokens.t: When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble.

verses.plain: Take fast hold of instruction; let her not go: keep her; for she is thy life.

tokens.t: Take fast hold of instruction; let
not go: keep her; for she
thy life.

verses.plain: ¶ Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men.

tokens.t: ¶ Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil

verses.plain: Avoid it, pass not by it, turn from it, and pass away.

tokens.t: Avoid it, pass not by it, turn from it, and pass away.

verses.plain: For they sleep not, except they have done mischief; and their sleep is taken away, unless they cause some to fall.

tokens.t: For they sleep not, except they have done mischief; and their sleep is taken away, unless they cause
to fall.

verses.plain: For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.

tokens.t: For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.

verses.plain: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

tokens.t: But the path of the just
as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

verses.plain: The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.

tokens.t: The way of the wicked
as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.

verses.plain: ¶ My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my sayings.

tokens.t: ¶ My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my sayings.

verses.plain: Let them not depart from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart.

tokens.t: Let them not depart from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart.

verses.plain: For they are life unto those that find them, and health to all their flesh.

tokens.t: For they
life unto those that find them, and health to all their flesh.

verses.plain: ¶ Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.

tokens.t: ¶ Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it
the issues of life.

verses.plain: Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee.

tokens.t: Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee.

verses.plain: Let thine eyes look right on, and let thine eyelids look straight before thee.

tokens.t: Let thine eyes look right on, and let thine eyelids look straight before thee.

verses.plain: Ponder the path of thy feet, and let all thy ways be established.

tokens.t: Ponder the path of thy feet, and let all thy ways be established.

verses.plain: Turn not to the right hand nor to the left: remove thy foot from evil.

tokens.t: Turn not to the right hand nor to the left: remove thy foot from evil.

footnotes.text: a crown…: or, she shall compass thee with a crown of glory
a froward…: Heb. frowardness of mouth and perverseness of lips
let…: or, all thy ways shall be ordered aright
